attributes.action: BAN: Career Charity Fundraisers from the Streets of England (aka Chuggers)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The streets are full of Street Charity Fundraisers, paid money by profit making companies to hassle people on the street. Guilting old women into giving their bank details on the street.

They are often rude and an obstruction to public pavements. 

Please BAN The PAID CAREER CHUGGERS!
